definition: to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)
abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]
seems as if/rather like/Taiwan pr. [si4 de5]
to appear to be/to seem as if
déjà vu (the experience of seeing exactly the same situation a second time)/seemingly familiar/apparently already acquainted
similar in expression and spirit/to bear a remarkable resemblance to
apparently right but actually wrong; specious (idiom)

sentences.english: "Emotion and molding" was very similar to the old topic of emotion and art.
sentences.chinese: “情感与造型”，似是重提了情感与艺术的老话题。

sentences.english: The audio book with a live goose, Donglai not far from Penglai.
sentences.chinese: 好把音书凭过雁，东莱不似蓬莱远。

sentences.english: The Moon whispers in your heart like an old soul everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 那一轮清月，却似神秘的心灵低语，如影随形。

sentences.english: Along the length of the filter, the interference film looks like a wedge .
sentences.chinese: 沿薄膜的长度方向看干涉膜似尖劈。

sentences.english: The team seems unstoppable in their drive for the championship.
sentences.chinese: 这支球队争取冠军的气势似锐不可当。

sentences.english: There is a football match on the playground.
sentences.chinese: 足球比赛时，运动员似在足球场上混战。

sentences.english: Light as a breeze, soft as a cloud.
sentences.chinese: 轻盈如微风，柔软似白云。

sentences.english: Parents' love, like air tightly to my parcel.
sentences.chinese: 父母爱，似空气紧紧将我包裹。

sentences.english: Sweet the rain's new fall sunlight from heaven.
sentences.chinese: 似细雨初洒，阳光降自天穹。

sentences.english: Thoughts may go exotic night souls, in the open on the Makino erratic.
sentences.chinese: 思绪似异域夜走的魂灵，在空旷的牧野上飘忽不定。

sentences.english: The fallow fields glitter like water indeed.
sentences.chinese: 休耕地似水面波光闪耀。

sentences.english: For unknown reasons, the prence of hypertension seems to be decreasing in the USA.
sentences.chinese: 目前，美国高血压患病率似在降低，原因尚不清楚。

sentences.english: Sleep apnea can also cause depression-like symptoms.
sentences.chinese: 睡眠窒息也能导致似抑郁症的症状。

sentences.english: Cease not your moaning you fierce old mother.
sentences.chinese: 不息的轰隆似愤怒老母。

sentences.english: All over Taiping there was a festive mood that hung fog-like around the surrounding mountains.
sentences.chinese: 太平的节日气氛似云雾一般缭绕在四周的山间。

sentences.english: Myxomycetes are a special group with characteristics both of animal and eumycetes.
sentences.chinese: 粘菌是既象动物又似真菌的一类特殊生物。

definition: to be as if.../to be rather like...
(literary) to be exactly like/to be exactly as if
